titles.title: Hymn 98 - When The Roll Is Called Up Yonder

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound,
And time shall be no more,
And the morning breaks,
Eternal, bright and fair;
When the saved of earth shall
Gather over on the other shore,
And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
On that bright and cloudless morning
When the dead in Christ shall rise,
And the glory of His resurrection share;
When His chosen ones shall gather
To their home beyond the skies,
And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let us labor for the Master from
The dawn till setting sun,
Let us talk of all His wondrous love and care;
Then when all of life is over,
And my work on earth is done,
And the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

verse.name: c1

When the roll is called up yonder,
When the roll is called up yonder,
